description: Creates a VPC endpoint service to which service consumers (Amazon Web Services accounts, users, and IAM roles) can connect. Before you create an endpoint service, you must create one of the following for your service: If you set the private DNS name, you must prove that you own the private DNS domain name. For more information, see the Amazon Web Services PrivateLink Guide.

parameters.name: NetworkLoadBalancerArns
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the Network Load Balancers. (string) ---

parameters.name: GatewayLoadBalancerArns
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the Gateway Load Balancers. (string) ---

parameters.name: SupportedIpAddressTypes
parameters.description: The supported IP address types. The possible values are ipv4 and ipv6. (string) ---

parameters.name: SupportedRegions
parameters.description: The Regions from which service consumers can access the service. (string) ---

parameters.name: TagSpecifications
parameters.description: The tags to associate with the service. (dict) --- The tags to apply to a resource when the resource is being created. When you specify a tag, you must specify the resource type to tag, otherwise the request will fail. ResourceType (string) --- The type of resource to tag on creation. Tags (list) --- The tags to apply to the resource. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:. Value (string) --- The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters.

nested_params.name: ResourceType
nested_params.description: The type of resource to tag on creation.

nested_params.name: Tags
nested_params.description: The tags to apply to the resource.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: The Availability Zones in which the service is available.

nested_items.name: AcceptanceRequired
nested_items.description: Indicates whether requests from other Amazon Web Services accounts to create an endpoint to the service must first be accepted.

nested_items.name: ManagesVpcEndpoints
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the service manages its VPC endpoints. Management of the service VPC endpoints using the VPC endpoint API is restricted.

nested_items.name: NetworkLoadBalancerArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the Network Load Balancers for the service.

nested_items.name: GatewayLoadBalancerArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the Gateway Load Balancers for the service.

nested_items.name: BaseEndpointDnsNames
nested_items.description: The DNS names for the service.

nested_items.name: PrivateDnsName
nested_items.description: The private DNS name for the service.

nested_items.name: PrivateDnsNameConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about the endpoint service private DNS name configuration.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The verification state of the VPC endpoint service.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The endpoint service verification type, for example TXT.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value the service provider adds to the private DNS name domain record before verification.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the record subdomain the service provider needs to create. The service provider adds the value text to the name.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags assigned to the service.

nested_items.name: ServiceState
nested_items.description: The service state. The possible values are Pending, Available, Deleting, Deleted, Failed, and Closed.

nested_items.name: RemoteAccessEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether consumers can access the service from a Region other than the Region where the service is hosted.

nested_items.name: ClientToken
nested_items.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request.
